contacts.name: Asta
contacts.signature: I shouldn't buy any more stuff...

122240000.text: Peppy found the "Joy Filtration Set." I know you're definitely to thank for this, {NICKNAME}

122240001.text: Peppy alone definitely couldn't do it

122240002.text: He was talking you up ever since he got back

122240003.text: I wonder what pitch of woof Peppy makes when he is buttering me up

122240004.text: Next time, you can ask him in person

122240005.text: Ah, it's nothing. No need to be so polite with me. I just wanted to help you

122240008.text: Alright. Enough about Peppy for now. I actually wanted to talk with you about something else today

122240009.text: You should go back and talk with the robot helper. It discovered something pretty wondrous near its location

122240012.text: You'll see as soon as you get over there. To keep the surprise, I won't spoil anything

122240100.text: Thanks for the help with the research, {NICKNAME}

122240101.text: Speaking of which, did you see the creation that looks like Madam Herta? Isn't it interesting? What did it say to you?

122240102.text: Oh, you're talking about Wisteria Cake. Yeah, she looks a bit like Herta. Even her personality is a bit similar

122240103.text: And she likes science. That day, she brought a few sidekicks with her and told me she wanted to finish a gene sequencing project, requesting that I nurture more creations for her to use for an in-depth research

122240105.text: Though I'm not sure I understand why Madam Ruan Mei's creation will be so similar to Madam Herta

122240106.text: I'm more curious about the "sidekicks" she had with her. Do those also look like other people

122240107.text: Yes, but not as close as you think... It's like running into someone wearing a matching shirt on the street. There are some similarities, but it isn't entirely the same

122240108.text: Exactly! I think it's almost a splitting image, right? I dub it the Micro-Herta and there is also a Mini-Mei!

122240109.text: The two little critters are pretty special. Their situation... the helper bot sent me the report

122240110.text: Right, the bot said it wants to see you. It sounds like the little one that looks like Herta has some problems

122240111.text: I'm not sure what they're trying to get up to... I have too much on my plate, so I can't leave. Besides, they asked for you specifically. Anyway, {NICKNAME}, head over when you have the time

122240112.text: That's a very Herta way of doing things...
